title: Create Driver Loan Details
description: Schema for validating the manual creation of a driver loan with installment schedule.

driver_id.description: The primary key of the selected driver from the 'drivers' table.

lease_id.description: The primary key of the selected active lease from the 'leases' table.

vehicle_id.description: The primary key of the associated vehicle from the 'vehicles' table.

medallion_id.description: The primary key of the associated medallion from the 'medallions' table.

loan_amount.description: The total principal amount of the loan in dollars.

interest_rate.description: The annual interest rate for the loan as a percentage (e.g., 10 for 10%). Defaults to 0 if not provided.

start_week.description: the date representing the starting week for the loan schedule in this week or next week

notes.description: Optional notes or purpose for the loan.
